CustomField.formula: IF (OR(ISPICKVAL(Apttus__Status_Category__c,"In Signatures"), AND(ISPICKVAL(Apttus__Status_Category__c,"In Authoring"),ISPICKVAL(Apttus__Source__c,"Other Party Paper"))), HYPERLINK("/servlet/servlet.Integration?lid=00b50000000l7uN"&"&eid="&Id, "Send To Other Party", "_self"), NULL)
CustomField.label: Send To Other Party (OBSOLETE)
